work.name: University of Notre Dame
work.summary: Helped students to understand data structures and algorithms for Programming Challenges, an elective focused on developing practical programming skills to solve puzzle-type problems that often appear in programming contests

work.name: University College Dublin
work.summary: Investigated the impact of using two frequency channels on a software-defined radio (Nuand bladeRF) to perform electromagnetic side-channel attacks on a development board (Adafruit Bluefruit Feather) running AES encryption

Volunteer.summary: Taught math to local children in the morning and afternoon and introduced them to my favorite board games
